author: Special Correspondent
text:
A Youth Red Cross (YRC) unit was launched at the Kasturba Gandhi Nursing College (KGNC) of Sri Balaji Vidyapeeth Deemed University.

K.V. Raman, Director of Health & Family Welfare and Secretary Indian Red Cross Society (IRCS), administered the oath to student volunteers.

In his inaugural address, Dr. Raman hoped that the initiative would kindle the spirit of dedication in the mind of young volunteers. Vice-Chancellor of Sri Balaji Vidyapeeth K .R. Sethuraman, in his address, exhorted the youth to be more service minded and have a sense of civic responsibility.

V. Gopal, Chairman, Managing Committee (IRCS), gave a brief about the Youth Red Cross and its commitment to humanitarian service.

K. Renuka, Principal of KGNC, was present.
title: Youth urged to have sense of civic responsibility
